original_title: Alberto Fernández Mindiola, el padre del canto vallenato
overview: A journey through the life and work of Alberto Fernández Mindiola, an iconic figure of vallenato folklore who, due to his vast knowledge and incomparable interpretation, ended up becoming an ambassador of the genre. In 1966, he introduced to the world the songs of maestro and friend Rafael Escalona.
title: Alberto Fernández Mindiola, el padre del canto vallenato
